text:
I have some problem with the log4j pom.xml file.
It's depend to jms, java mail, jdmk, jmx. But I NOT want to use jms , javamail, or other "cool" tools in my simple project. I want to using log4j with console and/or file logger. 

That's all.

I hope you marked these libraries as optional.

Best regards
creator: haber.janos@dk.hu
psmith@apache.org
text: latest trunk (aiming for 1.2.16) already has this item resolved.
